----- Original Message -----
From: lurningathome@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, August 18, 2002 12:01 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2257


In a message dated 8/17/2002 12:33:11 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> What about vouchers for homeschooling? If we are able to use them to
> choose a public school and the government "lets us" home unschool why
> can't we get our money and use it at home? Michele
>

WHen u accept money from the goverment like that....there is a price.....

Kim
